oai_dc:dc.dc:title: North High School, Home Economics Child Care Exhibit, Nashville, Tennessee, 1947 April 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured left to right: Ann Shearon, Alberta Odum, and Janene Hoffsinger, with a child care exhibit created by the North High School Home Economics Class, April 22, 1947. Forms part of the John Lawrence Connelly Collection, 1 b & w photograph
